actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to establish the Newberry Volcanoes National Monument in the State of Oregon, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the Newberry Volcanoes National Monument in Oregon as a part of the Deschutes National Forest and a component of the National Forest System. Abolishes previous designations of lands within the Monument as having status as a national landmark, the Lava Butte Geological Area, and the Lava Cast Forest Geological Area. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to develop a management plan for such Monument. Establishes the Newberry Volcanoes National Monument Advisory Council. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Newberry Volcanoes National Monument in the State of Oregon, and for other purposes.
